body_html: @cardshuffle I have a build.gradle file incoming that may help with this -- it will automate calling out to Bazel to build the native libs and then copy them into the appropriate directory. You can try editing the buildToolsVersion there once I get it checked in (if it's still giving you problems then).

body: @cardshuffle I have a build.gradle file incoming that may help with this -- it will automate calling out to Bazel to build the native libs and then copy them into the appropriate directory. You can try editing the buildToolsVersion there once I get it checked in (if it's still giving you problems then).
